Title: Limits the number of consecutive hours worked by certain employees of N.Y. city
Summary: Limits the number of consecutive hours worked by certain employees of cities of one million or more; provides that employees of cities of one million or more who are subject to a collective bargaining agreement shall not work more than 17 consecutive hours in a work day.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to limiting the number of consecutive hours worked by certain employees of cities of one million or more
